alert.note: Alert for Sheridan; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 1:58PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with gusty winds will impact portions of western Cherry and eastern Sheridan Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 1256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms with gusty winds from 8 miles west of Merriman to 19 miles south of Gordon. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Merriman, Medicine Lake, Highway 61 crossing the Snake River, Round Lake, Morgan Lake, Highway 61 Crossing The Niobrara River, Indian Hill, Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road, Intersection of Highway 20 and Irwin Road and Intersection of Highway 61 and Survey Valley Road. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 120 and 136. Highway 61 between mile markers 182 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building.
